title: BRIEF-Zijin Mining Expects To Increase Stake In Canada's Ivanhoe Mines
text:
BRIEF-Zijin Mining Expects To Increase Stake In Canada's Ivanhoe Mines

Stock Markets 39 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 07:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Zijin Mining Expects To Increase Stake In Canada's Ivanhoe Mines Oct 8 (Reuters) - Zijin Mining Group Co Ltd : * SAYS UNIT SIGNS AGREEMENT TO BUY 48.65 MILLION SHARES IN CANADA'S IVANHOE MINES LTD * SAYS IT EXPECTS ITS EQUITY IN IVANHOE MINES TO RISE TO ABOUT 13.88% FROM 9.8% AFTER THE TRANSACTION

BRIEF-Zijin Mining Expects To Increase Stake In Canada's Ivanhoe Mines
